description: The Cannon Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Cannon Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Cannon Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Cannon Mountain
shortDescription: The Cannon Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Cannon Mountain.
